description: This file implements the advanced interface functions for the Slap Access Manager Object in the SLAP framework. It includes functions for managing properties such as aggregation mode, LPC party addresses and ports, creating/deleting containers and objects, invoking objects, and managing object access and lifecycle, with support for remote access via LOA and LPC mechanisms.

methods.name: ULONG SlapAmoGoaGetAggregationMode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the current aggregation mode property of the access manager.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaSetAggregationMode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG mode)
methods.description: Sets the aggregation mode property of the access manager.

methods.name: USHORT SlapAmoGoaGetLpcPartyPort(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the LPC party port property.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaSetLpcPartyPort(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,USHORT port)
methods.description: Sets the LPC party port property.

methods.name: ULONG SlapAmoGoaGetLpcPartyAddr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the LPC party address property.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaSetLpcPartyAddr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ipaddr)
methods.description: Sets the LPC party address property.

methods.name: ULONG SlapAmoGoaGetLpcManagerAddr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the LPC manager address property.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaSetLpcManagerAddr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ipaddr)
methods.description: Sets the LPC manager address property.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapAmoGoaCreateContainer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * container_name,ULONG container_type)
methods.description: Creates a new object container given a name and type.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaDeleteContainer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapContainer)
methods.description: Deletes a specified object container.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapAmoGoaCreateObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapContainer,char * obj_name,ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Creates a new object within a specified container with a given name.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaDeleteObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject)
methods.description: Deletes a specified object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaInvokeObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc,char * method_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST ** params_out,SLAP_VARIABLE ** return_var)
methods.description: Invokes a method on a specified object, defaulting to a timeout.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaInvokeObject2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc,char * method_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST ** params_out,SLAP_VARIABLE ** return_var,ULONG ulTimeout)
methods.description: Invokes a method on a specified object with a specified timeout.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaAttachObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapContainer)
methods.description: Attaches a GOA object to a container.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaDetachObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject)
methods.description: Detaches a GOA object from its container.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaUnlinkObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject)
methods.description: Unlinks a GOA object from its container.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapAmoGoaAcqObjectAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapContainer,char * obj_name)
methods.description: Acquires access to a runtime object by name within a container.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaRelObjectAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject)
methods.description: Releases access to a runtime object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaFlushAllObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: This function is called to flush all remote objects. It interacts with the SLAP LOA interface to perform the flush operation when applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaEnrollObjDescriptor(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjDescr)
methods.description: This function registers a new object descriptor, utilizing the SLAP UOA interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaUnbindObjDescriptor(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name)
methods.description: This function unbinds an object descriptor by name via the SLAP UOA interface.

methods.name: BOOL SlapAmoGoaVerifyObjDescriptor(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name)
methods.description: This function verifies an object descriptor by name via the SLAP UOA interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaEnrollMobileObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjDescr)
methods.description: This function registers a mobile object descriptor through the SLAP LOA interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaUnbindMobileObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name)
methods.description: This function unbinds a mobile object descriptor by name via the SLAP LOA interface.

methods.name: BOOL SlapAmoGoaVerifyMobileObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name)
methods.description: This function verifies a mobile object descriptor by name via the SLAP LOA interface.

ctags.name: SlapAmoGoaInvokeObject
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc,char * method_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST ** params_out,SLAP_VARIABLE ** return_var)

ctags.name: SlapAmoGoaInvokeObject2
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc,char * method_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST ** params_out,SLAP_VARIABLE ** return_var,ULONG ulTimeout)
